original_text: And Jonathan made a covenant with the house of David, saying, “May the Lord take vengeance on David's enemies.”
korean_text: 이에 요나단이 다윗의 집과 언약하기를 여호와께서는 다윗의 대적들을 치실지어다 하니라

sentences.original_text: And Jonathan made a covenant with the house of David
“May the Lord take vengeance on David's enemies.”
